name: Lead Demolition
description:
A short bullet hell game where you have to dodge your own bullets and shoot the walls to destroy the room. Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Block

Shoot the pillars that appear for extra damage

Made in pygame in the last 3 days of the jam.

All assets were made for the jam other than the music you can find here.
